notes: Foreign key to join with the 'listings' table.

description: The specific calendar date this row refers to.
notes: Forms a daily time-series for each listing.

description: Indicates if the listing is available for booking on this date.
notes: Categorical ('t'/'f'). This is the primary information in this dataset.

description: The price for the listing on this specific date.
notes: All values are null in the provided sample. This confirms it cannot be used for target construction.

description: The price adjusted by Airbnb's Smart Pricing.
notes: All values are null in the provided sample.

description: Minimum stay requirement if booking starts on this date.
notes: May vary from the default in the listings file.

description: Maximum stay allowed if booking starts on this date.
